review.title: “A newer company with many kinks to work out but has the right idea about motivating staff.”
review.pros: Pros – Very motivational - provides many personal development tools. Awesome training that really helps you to perform the job well.
review.cons: Cons – Newer company, targets can be tough and management not always supportive when you're struggling.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – when a staff member struggles, spend more time developing them instead of pushing them harder....Stress is counterproductive.
